p: A MAXI imaging Pulse Amplitude Modulation (iPAM) fluorometer (Heinz Waltz GmbH, Germany) was used to evaluate the maximum quantum yield of photosystem II of the algal symbionts of Red Sea S. pisitillata and Mediterranean B. europaea. Following 30â€‰min of dark adaptation, triplicate measurements of the fluorescence in each aquarium were taken at each time point.
